StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_Rebirth_Dec
StringTable.String: The Terran's return forces the Drengin to pull warships from their occupied worlds. The Torians take advantage of this to gain their freedom. But they are still in Drengin space and will be enslaved unless they claim this sector, even if that means dealing with the Mercenaries of the Galactic Bazaar.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_Rebirth_ShortDec
StringTable.String: The Terran's return forces the Drengin to pull warships from their occupied worlds. The Torians take advantage of this to gain their freedom. But they are still in Drengin space and will be enslaved unless they claim this sector, even if that means dealing with the Mercenaries of the Galactic Bazaar.
